metadata.title: RZ/T2M cannot access EEPROM on the T2M RSK board. What could be the cause?

sections.content:
Question:
RZ/T2M cannot access EEPROM on the T2M RSK board. What could be the cause?
Answer:
There are two types of EEPROM sizes: 16kbit and 32kbit. Please refer to the following and configure the software settings according to the EEPROM size.
[RZ/T2M RSK board]
Serial No. of boards with 16kbit: 240493~240592, 242767~242866
Serial No. for boards with 32kbit: other than above
Refer to the following page.
https://www.renesas.com/document/tnn/notes-renesas-starter-kit-rzt2m-differences-eeprom-size?r=1593196
Suitable Products
RZ/T2M
RZ/T2M cannot access EEPROM on the T2M RSK board. What could be the cause?
